>>> from should_dsl import *

>>> 1 |should_be.greater_than_or_equal_to| 0.9
True
>>> 1 |should_be.greater_than_or_equal_to| 1
True
>>> 1 |should_be.greater_than_or_equal_to| 2
Traceback (most recent call last):
    ...
ShouldNotSatisfied: 1 is not greater than or equal to 2
>>> 1 |should_not_be.greater_than_or_equal_to| 2
True
>>> name = 'b'
>>> name |should_be.greater_than_or_equal_to| 'a'
True
>>> name |should_be.greater_than_or_equal_to| 'b'
True
>>> name |should_not_be.greater_than_or_equal_to| 'a'
Traceback (most recent call last):
    ...
ShouldNotSatisfied: b is greater than or equal to a
